missing-permissions: I can't connect to the voice channel you're in because I don't have `:permission` permissions for it
voice-required: You have to be connected to a voice channel.
missing-connection: I'm currently not connected to a voice channel.
sharing-connection: I'm already in the same voice channel as you, so I'll just stay here.
volume-while-not-in-channel: You must be connected to the voice channel I'm playing music in to change the volume.
skip-while-not-in-channel: You must be connected to the voice channel I'm playing music in to skip the song.
skip-while-deafened: You can't vote skip while being deafened.
disconnect-due-to-inactivity: The music has ended due to inactivity.
move-now-streaming: I am now streaming music in **:channel**

require.added-song: <@:userid> has added [:title](:link) to the queue. There are `:position` song(s) ahead of it in the queue.
require.invalid-youtube-link: The YouTube link given is invalid, only YouTube video links are supported.
require.error: I couldn't add that to the queue.

queue.playing:
[:title](:link)
Playing at `:volume%` volume with `:time` left of the song - Requested by :requester
queue.empty-queue: *There are no other songs in the queue right now*
queue.missing-dj-role: The `DJ` role is required to remove songs from the music queue.

pauseresume.pause-on-empty: The queue is empty, there is nothing to pause.
pauseresume.resume-on-empty: The queue is empty, there is nothing to resume.
pauseresume.resume-while-alone: There must be atleast one other person in the voice channel to resume the music.
pauseresume.is-paused: The music is already paused, use `!resume` to resume the music.
pauseresume.is-playing: The music is already playing, use `!pause` to pause the music.

repeat.enabled: Music queue looping and been turned `on`.
repeat.disabled: Music queue looping and been turned `off`.
repeat.empty-queue: The music queue is empty, there is nothing to be repeated.

shuffle.on-shuffle: The queue has now been shuffled.

voteskip.has-voted: You can only vote skip once per song! `:total` more votes needed to skip the song.
voteskip.just-voted: Your vote has been registered! `:total` more votes needed to skip the song.
